content:
I propose that we have an online party at 2022-07-21T20:00:00+02:00 to celebrate the complete formal verification of LTE.
Bring your own beer!

Here is a Zoom link for tonight celebration party:

Topic: LTE Celebration Party
Time: Jul 21, 2022 19:50 Paris

Join Zoom Meeting
https://cnrs.zoom.us/j/96019313033?pwd=cWtZMERWdGk4NE1rQnA0V3hWOFpoQT09

Meeting ID: 960 1931 3033
Passcode: 9tFWSL
This is in the middle of my working day but I'm sure nobody will mind
Party is starting! :octopus: :party_ball:
Oh, we missed the party. I assumed that someone here in Providence would tell everybody: "it's LTE party time". But we are so crazily busy that nobody thought about it :sad:
ha ha we were too busy doing PR reviews!
I'm sorry to have missed it! They're making me work too hard!
I'm sorry to have missed sneaking in to listen to the chat, but then I really needed to sleep! ('twas at 3.30am here)
